DisclosureDefinition.name: DisclosureDefinition
DisclosureDefinition.description: Represents information that defines a disclosure type, such as details of the publisher or vendor who created or implemented the report.

Description.description: The description about the disclosure definition.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the record.

DisclosureType.description: The type of disclosure that's used in the definition.

Language.description: The language associated with this record.

MasterLabel.description: The label assigned to this object.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Limit: 15 characters.
